title: Package Highlight #1 `dart_mappable`
snippet: Most developers are aware of the freezed package, but less so have heard of dart_mappable

title: The `Result` Type In Dart
snippet: The Result type can revolutionize your error handling by ensuring explicit and predictable control flows. Learn to avoid common pitfalls of traditional try-catch mechanisms and improve your code's reliability and maintainability.

title: Introducing `indices`
snippet: `indices` is a crate with zero allocation macros and methods for retrieving multiple mutable indices from a mutable slice safely.
